column4: Can anyone assist me with installing Ubuntu 7.10?  It loads from disc.  I click on "install" on the desktop, go through selecting a language etc, but when it gets to the part about partitioning the harddrive, it doesn't display my harddrive.  Any ideas? (There's a hard drive.)
reboot, do a checkdisk, reboot cleanly _twice_, and then try installing again
there's no OS on it anymore.  It was a blank HD
this is a new one for me :)
in a terminal, does anything show up for ls /dev/hd* /dev/sd* ?
I have no idea.  Lemme check
well, I'll check once it boots from disc again.
are you sure the drive is connected, detected in the bios, etc?
no, it told me that there's no such command.
